text: Ðis is þara X hidæ boc æt beorhtanwylle þe Ædred cing gebocode Æþelwearde his þegne on ece yrfæ.
Ðis synt þa landgemæro to Beorhtan wille.
Ærest of þam more be westan þam tune.
West andlang Dic of þa hæþenan byrigelsas þonne east andlang þan an heafdan on anne litelne þorn.
Þonon east & hwon suð on ge rihte to þam wege to gafær bæce.
Þo nord be þam and heafdan of þa lace andlang lace ut on temæse of midne stream andlang ea of ða ealda stræt andlang stræte on þone ford of þam forde west andlang mores of þæt man ær on feng.
